sentences.english: In beginning, she didn't like Inuyasha.
sentences.chinese: 一开始，她不喜欢犬夜叉，。
尤其是日本动画《犬夜叉》，《名侦探柯南》。

sentences.english: She will wish to see you, Inuyasha.
sentences.chinese: 她会许愿想见到你，犬夜叉。

sentences.english: Inuyasha and is discovered to be the reincarnation of Kikyo.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，她解除了犬夜叉的封印，并发现是桔梗转世。

sentences.english: Kagome can hear Inuyasha's voice even though she can't see him.
sentences.chinese: 虽然看不到犬夜叉但戈薇听到他的声音。

sentences.english: There she unseals Inuyasha and is discovered to be the reincarnation of Kikyo.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，她解除了犬夜叉的封印，并发现是桔梗转世。

sentences.english: He met Kagome and Inuyasha when he was attempting to avenge the death of his father.
sentences.chinese: 他在试图为父亲之死复仇时遇到了犬夜叉和戈薇。

definition: Death note (Japanese: デスノート), translation of cult manga series by author ŌBA Tsugumi 大場鶇|大场鸫[Da4 chang3 Dong1] (pen-name) and illustrator OBATA Takeshi 小畑健[Xiao3 tian2 Jian4]
cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
Dragon Ball, Japanese manga and anime series
puppet burial object/wooden effigy buried to put a curse on sb
Crayon Shin-chan (クレヨンしんちゃん), Japanese manga and anime series popular in China
voice actor (loanword from Japanese 声優 seiyū)
Orochimaru, Japanese folktale hero/Orochimaru, character in the Naruto manga series
